subject: Attn: Beneficiary
body:
Attn: Beneficiary
   Greetings to you. This is to inform you that your fund $5.5 million
dollars have been approved for transfer and have been transferred
successfully to your Bank account by our TELEX TRANSFER DEPARTMENT.
 
Please kindly find attached your approval certificate and copy of
the transfer slip for confirmation. 
You are expected to notify us
immediately your fund reflects into your Bank account so we know we
have successfully concluded the transfer of your fund. Be advised it
will take only 24 Banking hours for the fund to reflect into your
account which means your fund will arrive tomorrow afternoon in your
account.
    We thank you very much for your full co-operation and support
throughout this transaction as we look forward to do business with
you in the nearest feature.  We wait for your urgent matter.
    Congratulations for the success of your payment.
 Please sir kindly
send me your direct phone number so I can call you up immediately the
fund arrives at your account.
Yours Faithfully,
Jonathan Taylor
VICE PRESIDENT OPERATION
HSBC BANK UK

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary
body:
Hello Jonathan Taylor,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I appreciate your efforts in transferring the funds to my bank account. However, I have a few questions before we proceed.

1. Can you please provide more details about the approval process? How was my fund approved for transfer?

2. Could you explain what a TELEX TRANSFER is and how it differs from other forms of fund transfers?

3. I noticed that you mentioned an attached approval and copy of the transfer slip. Unfortunately, I didn't receive any attachments in your message. Could you please resend them?

4. You mentioned that I need to notify you once the fund reflects in my bank account. Is there a specific method or contact person I should reach out to for this notification?

5. Lastly, could you clarify what urgent matter you are referring to? Is there anything specific that needs my immediate attention?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on this matter.

Best wishes,
Vincent
